#summary Check prohibit text from target files

=== Check environment from target files === 

The following configuration snippet would check environment-specific each build phase.

For example, there is 3 build phase likes "local", "devel", "releae".
Surely, you don't want your "local|devel" DB's IP in "release" build phase!

This goal will check to make sure "local|devel"'s specific strings not in "release" build phase.

{{{
  <build>
    <plugins>
      ...
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.openwebtop.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-precheck-plugin</artifactId>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>environment</id>
            <phase>validate</phase>
            <goals>
              <goal>prohibittext</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
        <configuration>
          <environments>
            <environment>
            <description>Check IP Address</description>
              <extractRegExp><![CDATA[\b(?:\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}\b]]></extractRegExp>
              <checkTarget>
                <basedir>src/main/resources/real</basedir>
                <includes>
                  <include>**/**</include>
                </includes>
                <excludes>
                  <exclude>**/.svn/**</exclude>
                </excludes>
              </checkTarget>
              <checkSource>
                <basedir>src/main/resources</basedir>
                <includes>
                  <include>local/**/**</include>
                  <include>test/**/**</include>
                  <include>dev/**/**</include>
                </includes>
                <excludes>
                  <exclude>**/.svn/**</exclude>
                </excludes>
              </checkSource>
            </environment>
          </environments>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
}}}
